effect_entries.effect: Held: Fairy-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage. Changes Arceus’s and Judgment’s type to Fairy.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Fairy-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage. Changes Arceus’s and Judgment’s type to Fairy.

flavor_text_entries.text: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a stone tablet that boosts the power of Fairy-type moves.
